code:
graph TD
    A[Start] -->|Check Emacs installed| B{Emacs installed?}
    B -- Yes --> C{R installed?}
    B -- No --> D[Download and install modified Emacs & add to PATH]
    D --> E[Install Emacs in C:/Users/EmacsLyon]
    E --> C
    C -- Yes --> F{Python installed?}
    C -- No --> G[Download and install base R & add to PATH]
    G --> F
    F -- Yes --> H{GCC installed?}
    F -- No --> I[Install Python & add to PATH]
    I --> H
    H -- Yes --> J{SQLite installed?}
    H -- No --> K[Install GCC with MSYS2]
    K --> L[Add to PATH C:/msys64/mingw64/bin]
    L --> J
    J -- Yes --> M[Download babel.org file]
    J -- No --> N[Install sqlite3 with MSYS2]
    N --> M
    M --> O[Run test suite with C-c C-c]
    O --> P[End]
